\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Elijah|strong="G2243"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w appeared|strong="G3708"\w* \w before|strong="G3588"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w talking|strong="G4814"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

Listen \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*!”

\w Suddenly|strong="G1819"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w looked|strong="G3708"\w* \w around|strong="G4017"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w one|strong="G3762"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* except \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Going|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G2443"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w passed|strong="G3588"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*. \w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1831"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w want|strong="G2309"\w* \w anyone|strong="G5100"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w*,

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G2532"\w* understand \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w statement|strong="G4487"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w ask|strong="G1905"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w about|strong="G3588"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*.
